Options
```{r}
# Define genomic contexts
opts$anno <- c(
  "H3K27ac_distal_E7.5_union_intersect12_500",
  "H3K27ac_distal_E7.5_union_intersect12",
  "prom_2000_2000"
)

# Define groups
opts$groups <- c("E6.5", "E7.5")

# Differential testing hyperparameters
opts$min.LOR <- log(2)
opts$tail_prob <- 0.8
```


Load pre-computed differential analysis results
```{r}
diff.dt <- opts$anno %>% 
  map(~ fread(sprintf("%s/%s_mu.txt.gz", io$point_estimates.dir, .))) %>%
  rbindlist
```


Call differentially methylated features
```{r}
diff.dt %>%
  .[,sig:=abs(mean_LOR)>=opts$min.LOR & mean_diff_tail_prob>=opts$tail_prob] %>%
  .[sig==F,mean_diff_test:="Nodiff"] %>%
  .[sig==T & mean_LOR>0,mean_diff_test:=paste0(opts$groups[1],"+")] %>%
  .[sig==T & mean_LOR<0,mean_diff_test:=paste0(opts$groups[2],"+")]

diff.dt[,mean(sig),by="anno"]
```

Volcano plots
```{r, echo=FALSE}
for (i in opts$anno) {
  
  p <- volcano_plot(
    diff_obj = diff.dt[anno==i],
    mode = "mu",
    evidence_thresh = opts$tail_prob,
    change_thresh = opts$min.LOR,
    xlab = "Log odds ratio"
  )
  p <- p + 
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("lightpink3", "darkolivegreen3","#595959")) +
    scale_size_manual(values = c(1.75,1.75,0.6)) +
    scale_alpha_manual(values = c(0.8,0.8,0.4))
  
  pdf(sprintf("%s/volcano_plots/volcano_%s_mu.pdf",io$out.dir,i), width = 7, height = 5, useDingbats = F)
  print(p)
  dev.off()
}
```
